contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 1979 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section B)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section B) 30 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-section-b
Abbey Hall, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, England, UK The programme lists four adjudicators, two of which seem likely for music, two for presentation. They are, as listed in the programme, Capt. M. G. Lane, Ian Morrish, Simon Park and Major F. R. Sillitoe. If you know who adjudicated which section, please let us know.
Presentation: 1 Chinnor 2 Wantage 3 Pangbourne
March 28, 2013, 6:54 p.m. March 28, 2013, 6:59 p.m.
1 Chinnor Silver Band David Pegram
2 Wantage Silver Band Bob Cutting
3 Pangbourne & District Silver Band Harold Redfearn
Unknown Result East Woodhay Silver Des Webb
Unknown Result Chalgrove Band Phil Sperrin
Unknown Result Abingdon Band George Harker
